With a colonial-style, this room is located on the 1st - 3rd floors of the Historic Wing. It features views of the street or pool, while offering a separate living room. Marble bathroom offers both a bathtub and shower.

No capacity for extra bed.

Sky Club benefits include:
- Breakfast at Sky Club on the 20th floor (between 6:00 -22:00 daily) OR;
- Breakfast at Saigon Palace on the 2nd floor (between 6:00 - 9:30 daily)
- Afternoon tea (between 15:00 - 17:00 daily)
- Evening cocktails (between 18:00 - 20:00 daily)
- All day mixed nuts, cookies, and non-alcohol drinks

Other benefits:
- Free WiFi and laptop usage at Sky Club
- Free late check-out until 14:00 (subject to availability)
- Complimentary use of a meeting room for 1 hour (Maximum capacity of 10 people, subject to availability)

action_modal.details: For bookings made on or after April 6, 2020, be sure to consider the risk of the coronavirus (COVID-19) and associated government measures. If you don‚Äôt book a flexible rate, you may not be entitled to a refund. Your cancellation request will be handled by the property, based on your chosen policy and consumer law where applicable. During times of uncertainty, we recommend booking an option with free cancellation. If your plans change, you can cancel free of charge until free cancellation expires.
action_modal.title: Check your booking conditions

banner.subtitle: Starting April 6, 2020, your chosen cancellation policy will apply, regardless of the coronavirus. We recommend booking an option with free cancellation in case your travel plans change.
banner.title: Find a cancellation policy that works for you

hotel_text.important_information:
Airport pick up and drop off are available at a surcharge. Guests who wish to use this service are required to contact the property directly using the contact details provided in your booking confirmation.

In response to the coronavirus (COVID-19), additional safety and sanitation measures are currently in effect at this property. Guests are required to show a photo ID and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.

policies.content: You can cancel free of charge until 7 days before arrival. You'll be charged the total price of the reservation if you cancel in the 7 days before arrival. If you don‚Äôt show up you will be charged the total price of the reservation.

All children are welcome. One child under 2 years stays free of charge in a crib.
One child under 12 years is charged VND 329357  per night when using existing beds.
One older child or adult is charged VND 1386500  per night in an extra bed.
The maximum number of extra beds in a room is 1.
The maximum number of total guests in a room is 3.
The maximum number of cribs in a room is 1.
Any type of extra bed or crib is upon request and needs to be confirmed by management.
Additional fees are not calculated automatically in the total cost and will have to be paid for separately during your stay.
WiFi is available in all areas and is free of charge.
The property reserves the right to pre-authorize credit cards prior to arrival.
10 % VAT is included. 5 % Service charge is included. A City tax is not applicable.
items: A City tax is not applicable.

messages: Check for travel restrictions. Travel might only be permitted for certain purposes, and touristic travel in particular may not be allowed.
info_banners.title: Coronavirus (COVID-19) support
